metadata.description: Hey! Have you heard the news? BONEYARD IS BACK!  And in a special, oversize issue, no less!  Feeling inadequate next to Abbey's previous loves, Paris does what anyone would do: buy a self-improvement potion from Glump.  How could that go wrong? Also, Abbey in a black mini-dress and thigh-high leather boots.  We probably should've led with that.
metadata.name: Boneyard (Antarctic Press)
